src:
Selain Meme Anies 'Joker', Ini Daftar Pelaporan Kasus pada Ade Armando
05 Nov 2019, 12:09 by Rakhmad Hidayatulloh Permana
Jakarta - Dosen UI Ade Armando dilaporkan oleh anggota DPD Fahira Idris ke Polda Metro Jaya karena mengunggah meme Joker Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan. Selain soal meme Joker, Ade Armando juga pernah dilaporkan perihal kasus-kasus lainnya.
Sebagaimana diketahui, Fahira melaporkan Ade karena ia merasa tersinggung karena foto Gubernur DKI Jakarta itu diedit dengan riasan Joker dan disebarkan di media sosial. Fahira juga mempersoalkan kata-kata yang digunakan Ade dalam caption meme itu.
"Saya hari ini ke Polda Metro Jaya untuk melaporkan Saudara Ade Armando karena saya tadi pagi jam 11.00 WIB di kantor saya di DPD RI di Senayan saya sangat-sangat terkejut dan merasa tersinggung ya sebagai warga DKI Jakarta dan ternyata memang banyak sekali yang tersinggung," kata Fahira di Polda Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Sementara menurut pengacara Fahira, Kemal Shahab, pihaknya melaporkan Ade menggunakan Pasal 32 ayat 1 UU ITE.
"LP yang dibuat oleh Ibu Fahira terhadap saudara AA adalah terkait Pasal 32 ayat 1 junto Pasal 48 ayat (1) UU ITE, bukan Pasal 27 ayat 3," kata Kemal kepada detikcom, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Pelaporan terhadap Ade Armando ini merupakan kali yang kesekian. Sebelum pelaporan soal meme Joker Anies ini, Ade juga pernah dilaporkan ke polisi soal kasus lain. Ini daftarnya:
text:
Aside from Anies 'Joker' Meme, this is the Case Reporting List on Ade Armando
05 Nov 2019, 12:09 by Rakhmad Hidayatulloh Permana
Jakarta - UI lecturer Ade Armando was reported by DPD member Fahira Idris to Metro Jaya Regional Police for uploading Joker meme of DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan. In addition to the Joker meme issue, Ade Armando has also been reported about other cases.
As is known, Fahira reported Ade because he felt offended that the Jakarta Governor's photo was edited with Joker makeup and distributed on social media. Fahira also questioned the words that Ade used in the meme's caption.
"I went to the Jakarta Police today to report Brother Ade Armando because I was 11.00 WIB at my office in the DPD RI in Senayan. I was very surprised and felt offended as a resident of DKI Jakarta and apparently there were many who were offended," Fahira said at the Jakarta Metropolitan Police, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
Meanwhile according to Fahira's lawyer, Kemal Shahab, his party reported Ade used Article 32 paragraph 1 of the ITE Law.
"The LP made by Ms. Fahira to AA's brother is related to Article 32 paragraph 1, junto Article 48 paragraph (1) of the ITE Law, not Article 27 paragraph 3," Kemal said to AFP on Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Reporting on Ade Armando is the umpteenth time. Before reporting about the Joker Anies meme, Ade had also been reported to the police about other cases. Here is the list:
